title: Pendaflex Ready-Tab Extra Capacity Reinforced Hanging File Folders, Letter Size, Assorted Colors, 5 Tab, 20/BX (42700)
features: Ready-Tab letter-sized hanging folders have 5 built-in tabs for faster file setup
2" capacity box bottom holds up to 400 sheets, plus poly-reinforced edges give added durability
Box of 20 folders in blue, red, bright green, orange and yellow for general or color-coded filing
Write directly on tabs or use printer-ready adhesive labels included
description: Pendaflex Ready-Tab Extra Capacity Reinforced Hanging Folders have box bottoms that expand 2" to hold up to 400 sheets, plus 5 built-in tabs for faster file setup. Folders are lighter in color on the inside to prevent misfiling. Reinforced top and bottom edges make these time savers extra durable. Includes a printer-ready sheet of adhesive labels. Letter size, assorted colors: blue, red, green, orange, yellow. 20 Per box.

Pendaflex Ready-Tab Extra-Capacity Reinforced Hanging File Folders features Lift Tab technology that makes it easier than ever to tab hanging folders so your filing system is more efficient. Easily change tab position with clear tabs that are built into the folder. Tabs easily lift up and down. Write directly on tabs or use included sticker label sheet. Folders feature polylaminate strips on top and bottom edges for superior durability. Includes a pressboard-reinforced insert that allows the folder to expand 2" and hold up to 400 sheets.
